history.content:
[Apps close soon!]
 
Are you a recent or upcoming graduate interested in using your computer science skills to have real-world impact?
 
The application for Schmidt Futures’ 2020 cohort of Associate Product Managers (APMs) is now open.
 
APMs at Schmidt Futures will join a dynamic team and also help lead projects that use advanced computing to address some of the biggest challenges facing humanity across healthcare, education, energy, and other areas.
 
We are looking for entrepreneurial technologists who are motivated to change the world, eager to learn, and adept at bringing out the best in others.
 
Applications are open through Tuesday, October 1, 2019.
 
Apply now: https://schmidtfutures.com/our-work/talent/associate-product-manager/apm-program/
history.subject: APM Associate Product Manager Job Oppty
